project_descr: Elimination of Obsolete Pesticide Stockpiles and Addressing Persistent Organic Pollutants (POPs) Contaminated Sites within a Sound Chemicals Management Framework

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to protect human health and the environment locally through elimination of POPs and obsolete pesticide stockpiles, and addressing associated contaminated sites within a sound chemicals management framework.

document_name: Amendment No. 1 as of March 21, 2016 Elimination of obsolete pesticide stockpiles and addressing POPs contaminated sites within a Sound Chemicals Management Framework in Armenia

Clean-up and Disposal services for pesticide contaminated soil from the Nubarashen site in Yerevan, Armenia, implemented within the scope of the ?Elimination of obsolete pesticide stockpiles and addressing POPs contaminated sites within a sound chemicals
